attributes.action: To legalise marijuana in the United Kingdom
attributes.additional_details: . There are an estimated 31 million men and 32.1 million women in the UK that are of age. Lets say that each adult buys £10 worth every week that makes that’s £63,100,000 a week this is obviously an unrealistic number of buyers however the UK would benefit socially and economically from legalization and join the movement sweeping the world to legalize this natural plant. It may not be cure but it does help with the plain. It is safer than most legal medication that can kill if taken incorrectly
attributes.background: Marijuana can be used to null pain and help with certain cancers and other physical diseases such as cerebral palsy where it is able to help people’s body’s function well whilst still having the disorder
